item.title: Set up XBRL reports in Dynamics 365 Business Central
item.description:
1. XBRL is an acronym for which of the following?

  Excel Business Reporting Language

  XML Business Reporting Language

  eXtensible Business Reporting Language

  eXtended Business Reporting Language


2. Which of the following are the four types of linkbases?

  Label, Presentation, XML, Calculation

  Label, Reference, Presentation, Calculation

  Presentation, Reference, Calculation, XML

  Label, Reference, Presentation, XML


3. What is the purpose of the XBRL Export Instance – Spec. 2 report?

  Export the required financial reporting information to Excel.

  Export the required financial reporting information in XML format from an XBRL Specification 2 Taxonomy.

  Export the required financial reporting information in XML format from an XBRL Specification 2 Taxonomy to the XBRL organizational website.

  Export the required financial reporting information in XML format from an XBRL Specification 2 Taxonomy to a website of your local government to submit the annual accounts of a company.

item.title: Build dual-screen Xamarin.Forms apps by using TwoPaneView - Layout changes and larger screens
item.description:
1. TwoPaneView will only show a single pane under what conditions:

  Never, it always shows two panes (hence the name TwoPaneView).

  When the height and width of the window are below the minimum heights for tall and wide mode.

  When tall or wide mode are configured for SinglePane.

  When the height and width of the window are below the minimum heights for tall and wide mode OR when tall or wide mode are configured for SinglePane.

item.title: Build dual-screen Xamarin.Forms apps by using TwoPaneView - Detect and respond to spanning/unspanning the app
item.description:
1. The DualScreenInfo PropertyChanged event will be called:

  When the device is rotated, folded/unfolded, or the app is spanned or unspanned.

  Only when the device is rotated so that the app’s orientation is changed.

  Only when app is moved from one to two screens (or vice versa), such as when folded/unfolded or spanned/unspanned.


2. What control should you use to show content side by side on a dual-screen device?

  Only TwoPaneView can properly render your layouts across two screens.

  You can use DualScreenInfo to detect the hinge and screen coordinates and adjust any layout for two screens.

item.title: Build dual-screen Xamarin.Forms apps by using TwoPaneView - Display content on dual-screens
item.description:
1. How do I enable dual-screen layouts and detection in Xamarin.Forms?

  It just works in Xamarin.Forms.

  Add the Xamarin.Forms.DualScreen NuGet.

  Add the Xamarin.Forms.DualScreen NuGet and initialize in the Android application’s MainActivity class.


2. For apps to run on Surface Duo they must…

  …use the TwoPaneView control as their root layout on the main page.

  …implement DualScreenInfo to modify every page layout for dual-screens.

  …be an Android app. You can optionally enhance some (or all) layouts for dual-screen displays.

item.title: Write down or appreciate fixed assets in Dynamics 365 Business Central
item.description:
1. You want to post a write-down from the fixed asset G/L journal. What G/L accounts do you need to set up in the FA posting group for the asset that you want to post the write-down for?

  Write-down account

  Write-down expense account

  Write-down account and write-down expense account

  Write-down expense account and depreciation account


2. Where can you designate if an appreciation entry should be part of the depreciable basis?

  On the FA Posting Type Setup page

  On the FA Posting Group page

  On the fixed asset card

  On the Depreciation Book page

item.title: Write data in a Power Apps canvas app
item.description:
1. Which of the following is NOT a display mode for an Edit Form control?

  View Mode

  Edit Mode

  New Mode

  Interactive Mode


2. What function do you use to save the data from your form back to your data source?

  SaveForm

  Save

  SubmitForm

  You do not need a function. Forms automatically save the data to the data source.


3. What is the correct way to run a formula after a form has been successfully submitted?

  Put your formula in the OnSuccess property of the form.

  Add the formula to a Button control

  Put your formula in the OnReset property of the form.

  It is not possible to run a formula after a form is submitted.

item.title: Analyze collaboration and engagement using the Workplace Analytics Ways of working assessment dashboard
item.description:
1. Which of the following themes is NOT covered by the Ways of working assessment dashboard?

  Employee experience

  Cross-organizational connectivity

  Collaboration culture


2. Which of the following queries are needed to populate the Ways of working assessment dashboard?

  Collaboration overload and Standard meeting query

  Standard meeting query and Ways of working tracker

  Ways of working assessment and Standard meeting query


3. What does the Ways of working assessment consider a bloated meeting?

  2-18 attendees, 1-2 hours long

  2-50 attendees, 2+ hours long

  19-50 attendees, 0-2 hours long

item.title: Drive organizational change with Microsoft Workplace Analytics and MyAnalytics
item.description:
1. Which tools can you enable to help reduce the time spent in meetings?

  Workplace Analytics Plans

  The Personal Fitness tracker

  Workplace Analytics admin portal


2. What can you do to improve manager effectiveness?

  Launch the Workplace Analytics seller success plan.

  Enable insights for people managers.

  Provide all managers access to Workplace Analytics queries.


3. Which of the following should you consider when designing custom tactics?

  Start with the solution that requires the least amount of effort.

  Do what your competitors would do.

  Consider the barriers as to why someone wouldn’t adopt certain behaviors.


4. Which of the following are ways in which you can measure behavior across the whole organization?

  MyAnalytics dashboards

  The Workplace Analytics Ways of working tracker

  Insights for people managers

item.title: Measure Teams collaboration with the Microsoft Teams insights dashboard in Workplace Analytics
item.description:
1. To prepare the Workplace Analytics Power BI Teams insights dashboard, which pre-defined queries do you need to run?

  Standard person query and Microsoft Teams insights query

  Collaboration tracker and Influence insights query

  Microsoft Teams insights query and Influence insights query

  Influence insights query and Business continuity query


2. Which of the following reports are NOT presented in the Workplace Analytics Power BI Teams insights dashboard?

  What does adoption look like so far?

  Where can you focus training and education for Teams adoption?

  How can remote work effectiveness be improved?

  Are employees working after hours in Teams?


3. Which three opportunity areas for meaningful change are presented in the Teams insights dashboard?

  Protect wellbeing, Drive adoption with influencers, and Reduce adhoc calls

  Increase channel and IM use to speed up communication, Protect wellbeing, and Drive adoption with influencers

  Drive adoption with influencers, Reduce email hours, and Protect wellbeing

  Manage documents in Teams, Protect wellbeing, Drive adoption with influencers

item.title: Onboard to Microsoft Workplace Analytics
item.description:
1. Which of these roles is not used during Workplace Analytics setup and onboarding?

  HR database administrator

  Microsoft 365 administrator

  Workplace Analytics administrator


2. Which of the following is true of Workplace Analytics licenses?

  A Workplace Analytics license changes the user’s day-to-day experience.

  Workplace Analytics ingests and analyzes digital collaboration patterns for employees included in the analysis population.

  Workplace Analytics ingests telemetry data from employee computers, for example keystrokes, clicks, amount of time spend in applications.


3. Which role has full access to all Workplace Analytics features (including the ability to directly query the data set) but can’t change Workplace Analytics settings (like system defaults and privacy settings)?

  Microsoft 365 administrator

  Workplace Analytics administrator

  Workplace Analytics analyst

  Workplace Analytics analyst limited


4. Which of the following is true of Workplace Analytics settings?

  Working hours set by the admin apply to all employees included in the analysis population.

  Updating minimum group size and hashed subject lines in Privacy settings causes the changes to go into effect immediately and apply retroactively.

  If a specific email address is excluded, meeting hours for other employees that meet with the owner of that email address remain in the data set.


5. Which of the following attributes in the organizational data file is optional for the initial data onboarding?

  ManagerId

  LevelDesignation

  Organization

  Region
